# It's strongly recommended that you change the root password *123456* to another one

= change root password in a persistent way =
{{{
remountrw
rebind on
chroot /ro
passwd 
exit
rebind off
remountro
}}}


= Tip =
_To get strong passwords, install and use pwgen. It can help you a lot!_
{{{
# install it
remountw
rebind on
chroot /ro
apt-get install pwgen
apt-get clean
history -c ; exit
rebind off
remount ro

# example of usage
pwgen -c -n -s 12 1
}}}
